data.title: Grossing Movies of 2023
data.text:
Market Charts > 2023 > Movie Chart

North America (US and Canada) Domestic Movie Chart for 2023

Note: This chart ranks movies by the amount they earned during 2023. It includes movies released in previous years that earned money during 2023. For example, a movie released over Thanksgiving in 2022 will most likely earn money in 2022 and 2023. Click on the individual movie to see its total gross over all the years in which it played.

Inflation-adjusted figures are based on ticket sale estimates.

See Top 2023 Movies at the Domestic Box Office for the total domestic box office for the top 100 movies released in 2023, and Movie Index 2023 for an overview of all movies released in 2023.

Our Theatrical Market pages are based on the Domestic Theatrical Market performance only. The Domestic Market is defined as the North American movie territory (consisting of the United States, Canada, Puerto Rico and Guam).

The yearly amounts on our Theatrical Market pages are based on box office years. Each box office year starts on the first Monday of the year, so the previous year ends on the Sunday before the first Monday. For example, the "2017 box office year" started on January 2, 2017 so the "2016 box office year" ended on Sunday, January 1, 2017.
